website_summaries.verdict: Great in-home alternative to a bank safety deposit box. Not spacious, but will hold several smaller firearms or prescription medications.
pros: Keyless entry system with 4-8 digit combinations
Holds important documents, guns or medications securely
cons: May arrive with missing or broken pieces
Locking mechanism not strong against brute force
Batteries can fall out of plastic casing

customer_reviews.title: A Safe Safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very secure and durable safe that isn't made cheap. It's compact and has plenty of space that I needed to store important valuables. I would definitely buy another if I needed it and would suggest it to anyone looking for a small and affordable safe. It is fairly light as well. It just looks heavier that it really is. Setup was extremely easy and the instructions are clear as day. I setup mine in about 6 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works for what it is
customer_reviews.text: works as expected, bought this to fit in a small cubby with a door. Just wanted something to keep the kids out of the ready cash, no more no less. Works for that purpose. Would not store lots of cash or anything overly valuable in this since it is not fire proof, we have a different safe for that. this is more for weekly grocery money and allowances, that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannah O

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the second safe I own and I mounted this in an RV. Watch YouTube to see how to open it when it is unsecured or without a shelve above it. I would not put my life savings in it but to store some docs or cash it is fine....just bolt it down and have a shelve above it to avoid pounding on the top to open.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For College!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to bring to college and it's perfect! I keep it in the back of my closet and it's really easy to use. My brother set the code up for me and I like how I don't have to worry about using a real key. Pressing the numbers and turning the knob makes it less of a hassle and is quick too. There's also a good amount of space inside, so your money and other items will fit. For $50.61, purchasing this was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meera

customer_reviews.title: Great safe! Durable and double bolts are great
customer_reviews.text: Great safe! Durable and double bolts are great. The only thing is the beeping sound when pressing the key pad to open the safe cannot be turned off.
customer_reviews.author: LCD

customer_reviews.title: As far as security goes, it works. 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as security goes, it works. 1 set back is that the battery cover inside falls off and this will allow the batteries to drop out. Then you'll have to use the key. This defeats the purpose of keyless entry. 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, and was nicely packed in its box. Extremely easy to install, looks really nice, and easy to program your code. Only down fall it doesn’t come with batteries for it to function, but other than that 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what I’m doing wrong, but I can’t seem to get this thing to unlock. Even with the bypass key, which is problematic, to say the least. The instruction manual is no help. Perhaps I’ll go to youtube.
customer_reviews.author: haikugirl

customer_reviews.title: FACIL PRACTICA EASY PRACTIC
customer_reviews.text: EASY PROGRAMMING DOES NOT INCLUDE BATTERIES BRINGS TWO KEYS IT IS SUPER SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE I LIKE THE PRICE RATIO IS VERY IMPORTANT AND GOOD
customer_reviews.author: ISOL PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice small safe
customer_reviews.text: Great small safe. Son uses it it store medicine and cash in his dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: Safe came late. Also the safe doesn't even lock. I put my accepted pin in to engage the lock and o can still open and close the door. I was told to try new batteries, which I did, not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: christopher f.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a few months but so far so good! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jerg

customer_reviews.title: Well built and perfect for safeguarding small valuables.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safe for guarding small items such as money, documents, prescriptions, etc. Well built and impossible to break into.
customer_reviews.author: James Powell

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Is this a joke?? I spent alot on this and the keys and batteries came locked inside and there's NO manual. Feel like I got robbed because what's in front of me is just a fat block of metal and I'm literally trying to avoid being robbed CONSIDERING I TRIED BUYING A SAFE
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing and described accurately in size yet very disappointed because the locking mechanism didn't work and there were extra pieces I knew not what to do with. Not sure if I just received a faulty item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and durable I can hold 4 handguns in it
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Gibeault

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good small safe. Perfect for passports or other documents that you don't want laying around in random places.
customer_reviews.author: nathan walters

customer_reviews.title: Great little secure gun safe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my duty pistol and my back up. I store my patrol car keys and extra ammo as well. Perfect amount of room and was just what I was looking for. Surpassed my expectations! The beeping isn’t bad!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reeves

customer_reviews.title: OK if security is not your highest priority
customer_reviews.text: Shoddy fitting door, could probably bust open easily. Hopefully it's at least fire-proof but probably not for long. It might keep your 13 year old out for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great little mini safe. The panel that hides the keyhole is cheap plastic and sucks though.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Years of reliability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few years now and it works as intended! It’s a nice size for a few documents I keep at home.
customer_reviews.author: LVA

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the quality for $40
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality for $40. Does not protect against fire and an intruder could surely break in, however it works very to prevent little ones from accessing firearms.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were bigger...But we've all felt that way at one point or another, right? Fits what needs to fit. Gets the job done. Honestly really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Secure
customer_reviews.text: Lose your keys and batteries dead. Just smack the side and turn the thing at the same time to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Peeples

customer_reviews.title: Good safe product.
customer_reviews.text: Good safe for the price, perfect for a couple of hand guns. Plastic knob kind of cheesey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, fits under the bed, easy to open and the perfect size for documents and small valuables, a pistol and lock, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Luna

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this shiet
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine but now it doesn't want to lock when I close the sfe door but it locked when Its open. I wouldn't recommend anyone buying this. I just wasted a good 50 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: UPS. Will Not damage your merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Honeywell packages their products securely, so when Amazon beats up your package, the package still arrives undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wagemann

customer_reviews.title: Great personal safe. everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe. Easily wall mounted. Holds all my 7 & 8 inch tablets, coin collections, and more. Just slightly smaller than hotel room safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: A very nice small safe.... plenty big enough for important documents and a couple of handguns. Easy setup... fits nicely on a closet shelf without weigh overload.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Burg

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. Perfect for a small handgun plus other valuables. Easy to reset your pin.
customer_reviews.author: Tertillo

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase. Easy to figure out and great for a handgun.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Lock sticks, won't open reliably
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism on this safe sticks and takes multiple attempts to open. I wouldn't trust it for a situation that requires a fast and reliable open.
customer_reviews.author: ryan oakley

customer_reviews.title: Problem with combination opening door, but key open door just fine
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and heft of the safe. My only problem is I can’t get the combination to open the door, don’t know if it’s a faulty knob or what; for know I’m using the key, but that wasn’t my plan. Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loy

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and perfect for all my valueables!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: There are mounting holes on the bottom and in the back that would allow someone to reset the combination to the default and then
customer_reviews.text: There are videos on youtube that attempt to put this product down. I purchased this product anyway. There are mounting holes on the bottom and in the back that would allow someone to reset the combination to the default and then easily open the safe. I knew this ahead of time, and made sure to use the bottom holes to mount it to something. I then used a bit more common sense and put carriage bolts in the mounting holes I did not use, just to close those off. Works great if you use common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Snuts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great! what I need and didn't cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Very lightweight so it wouldn't be hard to just take it if someone wanted to but he is enjoying hiding his belongings in it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this model before purchased locally and was pleased; These were gifts and were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Col. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: the brand alone
customer_reviews.text: too small for my needs but very mobile. Honeywell doesn't disappoint on this product.
customer_reviews.author: utgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to keep my kids away from my stuff. It does its job well. Solid, easy to reprogram and perfect size for documents or a 9mm handgun and a few magazines.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: ... to keep my weapon in and I just absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this safe to keep my weapon in and I just absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Baskerville

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for small valuables
customer_reviews.text: This safe is the perfect size to hold small valuables. It can easily be hidden away or bolted down.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Nice small Honeywell safe!
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid safe. It is small and not overly heavy, but works just as it should. Fits my needs fine!
customer_reviews.author: startedmeup

customer_reviews.title: simple safe,,
customer_reviews.text: similar to ones found in hotel rooms,, great for small valuable to keep away,,I received it locked and had to call the 800 # to get help on how to open,, was very easy, for the size and price I will not complain...
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice little unit, beats paying for a safe deposit box at a bank
customer_reviews.author: Don G. Attix

customer_reviews.title: great for storing handguns
customer_reviews.text: great for storing handguns, can be opened quickly, 4 seconds to open and be locked and loaded, CA approved makes it even better
customer_reviews.author: Michael V

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work, I had to replace a part myself, which was quite a mechanical adventure for me....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. If you are determined to get in, you can but otherwise it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Fits my space perfectly and holds the valuables I have at home
customer_reviews.author: Jipsey2013

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged so the door doesn't open on its own . I have to use a flathead tool or strong knife to prop open the door after turning the key. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Priotti

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to anybody that's bargain price shopping
customer_reviews.text: We have had this now for almost 4 months and it still works great. We keep our gun in it and it has quick access with only four digits to open the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Liming

customer_reviews.title: great little safe
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe--does exactly what I need it to. I open it about twice a day, and the batteries haven't worn out yet (about three months so far).
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Embry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, reliable and DOJ certified for holding your firearm. If it had a backlight for the buttons, it would have five stars. It has mounting holes on the back and the bottom, the steel is very sturdy and the locking mechanism is sure to keep my grandkids from getting inside. I've read that because of thinning skin, there are reliability issues with finger scanners used by older people. I'm in my mid 60's and purchased this one without a scanner for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: So good, I bought 2 of them. one for me the other for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping a couple of guns and my medicine in.
customer_reviews.author: 18yr. Sniper USN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The safe was perfect for my needs worked perfectly and fit perfectly and mounted easily
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like it may have been a return
customer_reviews.text: the safe came with no keys so we couldnt open it. It seemed like it may have been a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe for a beginning saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect safe for a beginning saver. Unfortunately the buttons won't open it, he put in new batteries, a few will connect when they want to but most don't and non will complete the code. So since he has all my great-grandparents silver stored in it. I pray he never losses the key, which is unlikely. Brenda Griffis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted this to keep my son from attempting to grab something he shouldn't. Comes with the Hardware you need to screw inplace. In case someone's try's to take safe, and open later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for small stuff but because of the back up entrance not very secure for highly valuable items.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Other than that pretty decent quality and again you get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent safe for the price. Door to safe was bent when arrived. Had to use a hammer to bend it back. Also almost broke the plastic part when putting in batteries. Other than that pretty decent quality and again you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Tal

customer_reviews.title: door jams, difficult to open. batteries ran out ...
customer_reviews.text: door jams, difficult to open. batteries ran out after 6 wks of use. would not buy again. spend the money and get one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice quality safe at the price point
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality safe at the price point. Does what it says it will and the keypad works well every time. My only complaint is that you cannot quiet the beeps as you type in the code. I sleep with my main weapon though so I should have no reason to open it at night. Great to store multiple pistols in a stand up style so that they are safely locked away from the children.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: great product!! the mounting bolts are very nice a little weird to use but once you figure it out pretty awesome i do recommend this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Palopoli

customer_reviews.title: Merp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece a while back and it did not come completely assembled and was missing a few parts. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Be careful opening the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.text: My 14-year-old grandson really liked it, however, it was a difficult challenge to pry open the battery compartment!!!. One of the plastic prongs was easily bent but fortunately it did not break off yet. But looking at, it's just a matter of time! The overall design and sturdiness is very nice and he was happy with the function of the rest of the mechanisms. So far - so good!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not actual dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Well built for such a cheap project but it's not the dimensions specified. It is actually 12x8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good, awsom size
customer_reviews.text: Very good, awsom size, screws to walls easily, but I would like to be able to turn off the sound
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for small storage!
customer_reviews.text: If only the capacity was bigger... Works for most cases, very easy to use, very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tsun

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it's small and discrete. I bolted mine to the inside of my office draw.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little safe for the money. Its small enough to fit in a drawer. That being said it would have been nice if the mounting holes were a knock out instead of pre-drilled. Overall pretty nice. I haven't tried to pick it yet like other reviews say you can, but i don't doubt that you can from the way it feels. I wouldn't keep my life savings in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: It's not big, but fits my needs. If ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not big, but fits my needs. If you're looking to store 8x11 paperwork flat...this is not the one for you. Unless you roll it up. I needed something for my passport and documents in business size envelopes. Also if you're a gun owner, which I am not, it'll hold a few pistols safe from the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Glort

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe for Small Items
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item. Exactly what I was looking for. I had bought one from another vendor and had to return it due to a malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH  ROSENBERG

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe is Great, I returned it because it was too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mansa

customer_reviews.title: It arrived quickly and was a nice safe, however
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and was a nice safe, however, it was smaller than I expected and did not store as many prescription medications as I had anticipated. I was able to find a similar safe which cost less at Sam's Club. I sent this one back.
customer_reviews.author: Anna-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe investment
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend buying. The key pad is loud. The faceplate is made of cheap plastic. The battery compartment is also plastic and broke the first time I opened it to place the batteries in. The outside bottom portion has no cushion and it isn't smooth so it will scratch a desk, nightstand or whatever you place the safe on.
customer_reviews.author: MM370

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The back and bottom are just thin sheet metal but I plan on bolting it down anyways so those parts won't be accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Good for basic storage
customer_reviews.text: Good for basic storage. This is not a heavy duty safe. Anyone breaking in to a house could open in a heartbeat or take with them. But for storing m,one or prescriptions out of the way it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shan8037

customer_reviews.title: Wish you could specify what key model you would like when ordering
customer_reviews.text: Bought because I lost to the override key to my safe of the exact model. They ARE NOT universal or the same. They have a 4-digit code with them. I understand why, but there is no apparent way to purchase just a key. Wish you could specify what key model you would like when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it was DOJ approved. It is no more secure than a cardboard box. All you have to do is twist the handle in a certain way and it opens right up. No key, no combination needed. This is a tragedy waiting to happen for some poor family thinking their gun is safely locked away from the kids. Whoever does the approval from the DOJ should be ashamed of themselves and be fired. But then again, the DOJ doesn’t really give a damn how many kids get shot.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brandon

customer_reviews.title: great litte safe.
customer_reviews.text: great safe. requires batteries 4AA. two quarter in. holes in the back for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: but good. Over all
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but good. Over all, it is DOJ approved. It serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: applecider

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Has a small issue with the placement of the password reset button/ you can just unscrew it and move it inside the casing
customer_reviews.author: keaton ford

customer_reviews.title: kid proof so they are safe
customer_reviews.text: item arrived on time undamaged , easy set up and inside is large enough for 4 weapons with accessories
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Bad wall anchors..
customer_reviews.text: The wall anchors that came with it really didn't work well but I just screwed it to the shelf I out it on and it worked well! Overall a great product! Enough room to put a hand gun, a few mags plus important documents or credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap. opens with bang of the fist and a ...
customer_reviews.text: piece of crap. opens with bang of the fist and a jiggle of the handle
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B

customer_reviews.title: good safe
customer_reviews.text: Solid safe for the storage of 2 or 3 small firearms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe will not open without a screwdriver. The door ...
customer_reviews.text: Safe will not open without a screwdriver. The door jams. Everything else works okay but if you need to get into it quickly don't get this safe!
customer_reviews.author: hey:)

customer_reviews.title: Simply. Does. Not Work.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and followed the instruction and the thing simply doesn;t work. No matter. I sue it as a decoy anyway but I warn you. The thing simply didn;t work. There's a switch on the front from which you can manually close the door but it;'s not locked unless the setting works. If you want a real safe, go with a combo safe. The digital safes simply are more trouble than they're worth.
customer_reviews.author: El Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, I like that it can be bolted to the floor or shelf. I also like that it comes with keys to open the safe if you dont want to use the keypad or if the keypad stops functioning. Seems pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemus

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell small steel safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe was everything I expected, it is great and easy to change the combination. It is a great product and thank you Amazon for making shopping easy. Ken
customer_reviews.author: Ken Myers

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Half the time it takes several twists on the knob to open it. After one year of use, it now WILL NOT LOCK!
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Certainly good value for money! Came with clear instructions and was setup in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: might have been sold, returned and sold again to me
customer_reviews.text: i really dont want to go through the trouble to return it but, just a few things... 1. there is a gap in the back where it is not put together all the way. you can slide a credit card in from the back if you wanted to. 2. it was locked when i got it. 3. there were no corner protective thingy's like the manual said there would be... i think this unit was pre sold, returned and then sold to me without having fixed it, etc. not cool. otherwise, its alright i guess
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the boxed item, noticed it was making a clanking sound when you rotated the box. Thought it was the shelf or something. Did not open as it was a gift for my son. He opened it up on Christmas morning to find that the guts of the door were all over the place and there was a post-it on the outside of the safe that read "defective cylinoid". How do you explain that to a kid who just opened a present from Santa?? Returned it. Going with another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: making it effectively useless as I can not open the door to even ...
customer_reviews.text: Safe arrived with no override key, making it effectively useless as I can not open the door to even get the instruction manual. Please assist.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Bach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size safe, easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect safe for money & personal papers. It has a bolt down feature which secured it to our concrete floor. It's fire proof as well. Very easy to use. Has both keys & electronic key pad. Quick shipping as well & a great price.
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: Made it through our house fire.
customer_reviews.text: This little safe is great. We had a house fire and lost our house and everything. All the stuff in this safe had a little smoke damage, but came out just fine, Thank God, because we had ALL our important paperwork in there. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

product_meta.title: Small Security Safe with Digital Lock
product_meta.description:
Size:.27 cubic ftThe Approved Small Security Safe offers personalized protection with its programmable digital lock. This Digital Steel Security Safe features 2 live steel locking bolts for added security. There are also concealed hinges and a recessed door that are designed to prevent anyone from being able to pry open the safe. Our small security safe has been approved by the DOJ as a firearms storage device. There is a lighted keypad for convenience and 2 emergency override keys included just in case. The exterior dimensions are 7.9 in H x 12.2 in W x 8.1 in D. The interior dimensions are 7.8 in H x 11.9 in W x 5.1 in D. This safe weighs 13.2 lbs. LH Licensed Products, Inc. leverages premium consumer brand power to deliver innovative solutions for unmet and emerging consumer needs around the world. Our products are currently available in over 70 countries across the globe. LH Licensed Products, Inc. is the exclusive licensee and manufacturer of Honeywell Safes, Paper Shredders and Door Locks. Our partner company, Lewis Hyman Inc. began in 1930 as a family window treatment business in New York City. Widely recognized for lifestyle product innovation, Lewis Hyman Inc. has established a tradition of quality and service, spanning three generations and over eighty years of expertise. Use your Amazon gift card and search our other amazing products at our Amazon storefront - https://www.amazon.com/Honeywell/pages/2529571011

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Honeywell 5101DOJ Small Steel Security Safe is a California Department of Justice approved firearms storage device. The features a 0.36 cubic feet storage capacity, mounting down capabilities, concealed hinges and recessed door for prying resistance and a solid steel cabinet and door design. This safe has a scratch resistant powder coat finish. The lock type is a programmable digital lock and there is an emergency override key access. The Honeywell safe product line provides safety and security for your essential documents and most valuable possessions while affording you the peace of mind that comes from being prepared in the event of a disaster, fire, or an invasion of your home or office. This particular model is perfect to lock up prescription medications for safety, or hold your passport and any other important papers. The safe weighs 13.1 lbs. The outside dimensions are 7.9 x 12.2 x 8.1. The inside dimensions are 7.7 x 12.0 x 6.8. Four (4) AA batteries required and included. Backed up by a 7 year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: STEEL SECURITY SAFES - The Honeywell Steel Security Safe product line provides safety and security for small items like your passport, money, wallet, jewelry, or prescription drugs. These are great safes because they come with mounting hardware and can be bolted down to the inside of a cabinet, shelf, desk, or wood floor. Protect your most valuable possessions and electronics, from theft and tampering. Honeywell security safes are backed by a 7-year limited warranty.

FEATURES - The Approved Small Security Safe offers personalized protection with its programmable digital lock. This Digital Steel Security Safe features 2 live steel locking bolts for added security. There are concealed hinges and a recessed door that are designed to prevent anyone from being able to pry open the safe. Our security safe has been DOJ approved as a firearms storage device. There is a LED display panel and 2 emergency override keys included. The exterior dimensions are 7.9 in H x 12.2 in W x 8.1 in D.

QUALITY MADE – As a Honeywell brand licensee, we have a responsibility to conduct ourselves with the highest levels of integrity in everything we do. This helps us sustain the credibility of the brand, maintain the strong reputation, and build on our track record of growth and performance. From the shop floor to the boardroom, all Honeywell licensees and representatives are held to the highest standard and we exceed all laws and regulations in the countries where we do business.

SECURE - Honeywell Safes, Paper Shredders and Door Locks are manufactured and distributed exclusively by LH Licensed Products, Inc. These products provide security and safety for your important and irreplaceable documents and your most valuable personal possessions. We offer products that help deliver peace of mind by protecting your belongings against damage or loss in the event of fires, floods and other natural disasters as well as unauthorized intrusion and invasion of your home and office.

TRUSTED COMPANY - The Honeywell trademark is licensed from Honeywell International Inc., a Fortune 100 company that invents and manufactures technologies to address some of the world’s toughest challenges linked to global macro trends such as energy efficiency, clean energy generation, safety and security, globalization and customer productivity. Technology from Honeywell International Inc. is in 150 million homes and 10 million buildings worldwide.
